mapper.select: select * from chatMessage cm order by cm.messageSendTime asc limit #{start},100
select * from chatMessage cm where cm.chatMessageId = #{chatMessageId}
mapper.insert: insert into chatMessage(chatMessage, fromUserId, toUserId, toChatRoomId, messageSendTime, needRead) values(#{chatMessage}, #{fromUserId}, #{toUserId}, #{toChatRoomId}, #{messageSendTime}, #{needRead})
mapper.delete: delete from chatMessage cm where cm.chatMessageId = #{chatMessageId}
delete from chatMessage cm where cm.fromUserId = #{fromUserId} and cm.toUserId = #{toUserId}
delete from chatMessage cm where cm.fromUserId = #{fromUserId}
mapper.select: select * from chatMessage cm where (cm.fromUserId = #{fromUserId} and cm.toUserId = #{toUserId}) or (cm.fromUserId = #{toUserId} and cm.toUserId = #{fromUserId}) order by cm.messageSendTime asc limit #{start},#{maxLength}
select * from chatMessage cm where cm.fromUserId = #{fromUserId} and cm.toUserId = #{toUserId} and cm.needRead = #{needRead}
select * from chatMessage cm where cm.fromUserId = #{fromUserId} and cm.toUserId = #{toUserId} and cm.needRead = #{needRead}
select * from chatMessage cm where cm.toUserId = #{toUserId} and cm.needRead = #{needRead}
select * from user u where u.userId in (select distinct fromUserId from chatMessage cm where cm.toUserId = #{toUserId} and cm.needRead = #{needRead})
